channel.title: jimgrisham tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from jimgrisham.

item.description: @tonttu_torvinen @YaKiss7 @TrentTelenko How much to they have to pay the workers / suppliers / etc. not to run off with the raw materials and components?

@brianstelter The 11pm EDT broadcast might find substantial viewership outside of that timezone. For those in the western states, the actual, live, ‚Äòprime time‚Äô hearings are taking place during commute / dinner hours.

@OHelp_Me_Rhonda @douglasjkeurig I‚Äôve heard from several folks from US mid-Atlantic region: ‚Ä¶ during the height of summer the cloudless sky sometimes appears more white than blue. - Maybe they‚Äôre mistaken? - Pollution? - Humidity + temperature?
@BarbiePodgorski @zerocovid4kids @MaggieM00021130 Is this in all of Canada or only certain provinces? Can regular folk get a #NAAT, at least?
@LiberalResults @jeichlerlevine Perhaps that‚Äôs more of an indictment of end-stage capitalism, inequality, and other systemic factors than of the individuals themselves‚Ä¶

@BergqvistRene @PhillipsPOBrien @TheStudyofWar @criticalthreats While it may not be their intention, this could actually benefit Ukraine in the mid-to-long* term by making Putin complacent enough to further over-extend Russia. (* Enormous short-term human toll, however)

@chriswintersva @PhillipsPOBrien @TheStudyofWar @criticalthreats It sounds like there‚Äôs not an enormous population quantity left, in many cases, to ‚Äòoccupy‚Äô once the battle rolls through an area once or twice‚Ä¶

@jim_enloe @ArmchairG3neral @OSpurdo @WarObserver14 @kms_d4k @dim0kq The one they were testing in early 2021 (with terminal p/n 00105950-501): Ku-band antenna (012987-501) Tx gain: 34.2 dBi Beamwidth: 3.5deg. (HPBW) Tx power: 3.2 W Tx ERP: 5.1 kW Tx EIRP: 39.1 dBW 14.125 & 14.375 GHz antenna patterns: https://t.co/AXP5PGj1z6
@Debkrol @aurabogado Agreed - you were clear. (I just wanted to emphasize to folks that there was still a significant period of time with little-to-no ventilation.)

@Debkrol @aurabogado Risk: Terminal > in seat while engines running ‚Ä¶ but ‚Ä¶ Boarding / unboarding > terminal > in seat while engines running [_If_ shore ventilation is hooked up (those flexible yellow hoses from the JetWay) it‚Äôs still less effective than that provided by the engine bleed air.]

@DanielH62075987 @dwery @hdevreij @MarzMerco Most of those systems traditionally required a ground station staying stationary for up to few minutes at a time at each location to get such a precise fix.
@chriseyre2000 @QuinnyPig Those could be added to the list as well, right? If not, that‚Äôs quite an indictment of ‚Äúmodern software development‚Äù indeed.

@QuinnyPig Don‚Äôt all major orgs now have software that can pre-vet any URLs inside e-mails? I get that a ‚Äòallow-list over deny-list‚Äô philosophy can be more work (and piss off e-mail #marketing/#tracking companies), but maybe now is the time to give it serious thought.
@DarleneDempsey6 @kinda_a_lot @LouisBLouisIV Sometimes it really is better to ask for forgiveness rather than permission. That seems to qualify as one of those cases!

@LJC777 @DrKevGuitar @rossco33100 @mo_el_le @sbwuatx45lamar ‚Ä¶ except for the increasing number of industries in the past decade, including _fast-food restaurants_, that have been demanding new hires sign ‚Äònon-compete‚Äô contracts barring them from working elsewhere in the same industry for some period of time (e.g. 2 years) after leaving.
This whole thread, from the beginning, is intriguing! (‚Ä¶ or perhaps I only _thought_ it was due to my dopamine receptors.) https://t.co/FRPSlq9kt7
@Osinttechnical There‚Äôs a likely a _much_ larger supply of the PGK(?) guided fuzes for ‚Äòregular‚Äô shells, right?

@CookingLight Do you offer warranty (or any post-sale) support for your house-branded cookware? What about care instructions? The @Target / @TargetNews product links on this page no longer work: https://t.co/WMG9fg3Ded
@erinbiba I believe it was much more useful before it got overwhelmed with advertising and tracking code. The public interface never made much sense‚Ä¶

@ClaraJeffery @Mark_Kawada * That should, of course, read ‚Äú‚Äòperennial‚Äô favorite‚Äù ü§≠ (although @AshleyGWinter and others might agree that non-strenuous walking could be helpful in strengthening pelvic muscles‚Ä¶)
@realjrobinson86 @Osinttechnical @TrentTelenko Electric vs. petrol?
